articles.title: Generation Z is Losing a Skill That Shaped Human Progress for 5,500 Years—40% Are Falling Behind - The Daily Galaxy
articles.description: Generation Z is losing a skill that has shaped human communication for thousands of years. With digital devices taking over, handwriting is becoming a rare art. The consequences of this shift are starting to show in surprising ways.
